Uber - Trust & Safety | San Francisco | Full-time | ONSITE

Uber's Trust & Safety team is hiring backend, mobile, and full-stack engineers. We develop technology to help make millions of rides safer every day.

Our tech stack includes Go, Java, Kafka/Samza, Spark, Python, Node.js, Cassandra. We work on a bunch of interesting problems in signal processing, machine learning, and distributed systems.
